testcase.name: jsonSchema

failure.message:
1 expectation failed. Response body doesn't match expectation. Expected: The content to match the given JSON schema. error: instance type (integer) does not match any allowed primitive type (allowed: ["string"]) level: "error" schema: {"loadingURI":"file:/C:/Users/LENOVO/Desktop/automation_selenium/restAssured/target/test-classes/schema.json#","pointer":"/items/properties/price"} instance: {"pointer":"/0/price"} domain: "validation" keyword: "type" found: "integer" expected: ["string"]
Actual: [ { "author": "Dinesh Bhatt", "category": "Suspense", "price": 200, "title": "Hassen dillruba", "id": "10e7" }, { "author": "Kiyo saki", "category": "Financial", "price": 190, "title": "Rich Dad Poor Dad", "id": "752a" }, { "author": "Chetan Bhagat", "category": "Romance", "price": 260, "title": "Half Girlfriend", "id": "d67a" } ]
